attributes.action: support parents to send their children to the local school in order to improve social cohesion within our towns and cities.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
By doing this you will:

1) Ensure each school has an equal demographic - instead of a current mix which consists of those who can afford to drive to another school and those who cannot

2) Ensure more social harmony within our towns and villages - with rich and poor mixing on a level playing field

3) Improve all school performances by having a better mix of ability across all schools - learning is contagious

You will also: 

4) Remove 80% of the cars off the road in between 8.30-9.00am and 3.00-3.30pm - less congestion and less pollution

5)Ensure more children are walking/cycling to school which will make for more healthy and less obese children and help concentration within the classroom

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
